mods.abstract: WLW (Cincinnati, OH) radio program featuring the Buccaneers, original broadcast date unknown, circa 1944 (part 2). Featuring Jimmy Leonard, Tiny Stokes, Jerry Richards, Tony Walberg, Captain Stubby, and Sonny Fleming, with announcer Cecil [last name unknown].

subject.topic: Captain Stubby and the Buccaneers (Musical group)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
